live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
56708.summary: Some customers in the Windsor Park area of North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56708.title: Jan 2 - North Vancouver (Windsor Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: The issues have been resolved and all services should be up and running. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. Further updates will be provided by 4:55PM CT
56702.summary: Some customers in Prince Albert are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56702.title: Jan 2 - Prince Albert | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
